product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Zip Stash Wallet
long_description: By using RFID-blocking technology, the pocket-size, fully zipped RFID Zip Stash Wallet from Eagle Creek helps prevent thieves with scanners from stealing info off your credit cards. RFID-blocking technology helps protect personal information on ID and credit cards with a frequency range of 10 MHz to 3 GHz. Zippered pouch features slim styling; 2 mesh dividers hold cash and cards; room for lip balm or coins. Key ring lets the Eagle Creek RFID Zip Stash Wallet double as a keyholder.
short_description: By using RFID-blocking technology, the pocket-size, fully zipped RFID Zip Stash Wallet from Eagle Creek helps prevent thieves with scanners from stealing info off your credit cards.
